title: AI-Powered Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with AI assistant integration using OpenAI GPT. Features include context-aware responses, conversation history, and WebSocket communication.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and order tracking. Built with modern web technologies.

title: Machine Learning Model Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing ML model performance, training metrics, and predictions. Includes real-time data updates and model comparison tools.

title: Task Management System
description: Collaborative task management tool with team features, real-time updates, and project tracking. Inspired by modern productivity tools.

title: Computer Vision API
description: RESTful API for image recognition and object detection using deep learning models. Supports batch processing and custom model training.

title: Portfolio CMS
description: Headless CMS built for managing portfolio content with a beautiful admin interface. Features markdown support and media management.
